name: Two Sides
description:
Two Sides is a short, non-linear, exploration-investigation based sidescrolling point and click adventure game.

You play as Carol Bell, wife of the esteemed Dr. Roy Bell. She is home alone one night when she is woken by the sound of glass breaking. Someone has broken in.

Explore her house, find out what's going on and confront the intruder!

Credits:

  • Art and Animation: Jensen Verlaan
  • Writing: Kevan Chambers
  • Programming: Sebastian Scaini
